item.description: On Wed. November 18th China Blossom in North Andover is hosting a sake dinner. The dinner will be hosted by a certified sake professional who will show us the ins and outs of pairing sake with Asian food. Tickets are just $40 for four sakes and three courses of the best Chinese food you've tasted! More info here: http://www.chinablossom.com/year-of-the-dragon/

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Sake Dinner at China Blossom
